caption: Permission Analysis
description: The Permission Analysis object describes outcomes of the analysis performed on an Identity's permissions/privileges. E.g, this object can be used to describe the analysis of an AWS IAM Policy
name: permission_analysis

condition_keys.description: The condition keys that were evaluated in the policy. E.g. aws:SourceIp:1.2.3.4

granted_privileges.description: The privileges, actions that were granted by the policy. E.g. AWS RunInstances, GetObject etc.

policy.description: Details about the policy that was the subject of the analysis.

unused_privileges_count.description: The number of unused privileges, actions in the policy.

unused_services_count.description: The number of unused services in the policy. E.g. AWS S3, SQS, IAM etc.
